login.info.content: ZeroPass is a password protection and management tool. It secures all your valuable digital assets, including your personal vault items and the company vault items. Companies no longer need to worry about leaks of the secret passwords or keys when they share or assign their valuable website and application accounts to their employees or partners.
login.qrcodedetect.tip: Make sure the TOTP QRcode is displayed on screen, and click to scan it.
